description: This is such a fantastic idea – take a traditional smoothie mix, make itreally thick, then top it with your favourite fruit, as well as a combination of crunchy seeds or cereals. Your body will love you.
name: Berry & Chia Smoothie Bowl Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Put the smoothie ingredients in a high-speed blender or food processor and whizz until smooth. Transfer to two bowls.
Lay the mango slices in a starburst pattern over half the surface, thenarrange the almonds, raspberries, pumpkin seeds, and mulberries in stripeson the other half.
